org.fhaes.FHRecorder.view

Class GraphSummaryOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel
              • org.fhaes.FHRecorder.view.GraphSummaryOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.print.Printable, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, org.jfree.chart.event.ChartChangeListener, org.jfree.chart.event.ChartProgressListener, org.jfree.chart.event.OverlayChangeListener

    public class GraphSummaryOverlay
extends org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel
    GUI_GraphSummaryOverlay Class. This is an overlay graph which includes # of events as a bar chart, # of recorders as a line graph, and # of samples as a line graph.
    Author:
    Cody Calhoun, Seth Westphal, Anthony Messerschmidt
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphSummaryOverlay

        public GraphSummaryOverlay(java.util.List<YearSummary> inData)
        This is the constructor for the YearSummaryOverlayPanel. This will create the chart based on the incoming list of YearSummary objects.
        Parameters:
        inData - This is the list of the incoming YearSummary objects. It is the data used to create the graphs.

    • Method Detail

      • createEventsDataset

        private static org.jfree.data.category.CategoryDataset createEventsDataset(java.util.List<YearSummary> inData)
        This method will create the data set corresponding to the events bar chart (histogram) which JFreeChart uses to create the graph.
        Parameters:
        inData - This is the list of the incoming YearSummary objects. It is the data used to create the Events histogram.
        Returns:
        This method returns the CategoryDataset object that JFreeChart needs to create the Event bar graph.

      • createRecordersDataset

        private static org.jfree.data.category.CategoryDataset createRecordersDataset(java.util.List<YearSummary> inData)
        This method will create the data set corresponding to the recorders line graph which JFreeChart uses to create the graph.
        Parameters:
        inData - This is the list of the incoming YearSummary objects. It is the data used to create the number of recorders line.
        Returns:
        This method returns the CategoryDataset object that JFreeChart needs to create the recorders graph.

      • createSamplesDataset

        private static org.jfree.data.category.CategoryDataset createSamplesDataset(java.util.List<YearSummary> inData)
        This method will create the data set corresponding to the samples line graph which JFreeChart uses to create the graph.
        Parameters:
        inData - This is the list of the incoming YearSummary objects. It is the data used to create the number of samples line.
        Returns:
        This method returns the CategoryDataset object that JFreeChart needs to create the samples graph.

      • updateChartData

        public void updateChartData(java.util.List<YearSummary> inData,
                            boolean savePosition)
        This method updates the data in the graph which forces the graph to redraw.
        Parameters:
        inData - This is the list of the incoming YearSummary objects. It is the data used to update the graphs.
        savePosition - When savePosition is set to true then this method will automatically scroll to the section of the graph that was viewable before calling this method. Otherwise when savePosition is false, the graph will scroll to the first year.

      • getMaximumRangeLabelWidth

        public int getMaximumRangeLabelWidth()
        Returns:
        the approximate width of the label in pixels corresponding to the largest value of the overlay graph's y axis.

      • getMaximumRangeValue

        private int getMaximumRangeValue(java.util.List<YearSummary> inData)
        Parameters:
        inData - This is the list of YearSummary objects (the data) which is used to calculate the maximum value the y axis can be.
        Returns:
        This method returns the maximum value the y axis of this overlay graph can be.

      • updateMaximumRangeValue

        private void updateMaximumRangeValue(java.util.List<YearSummary> inData)
        This method will update the maximum value the y axis can be.
        Parameters:
        inData - This is the List of year summary objects which has the data used to update the maximum value the y axis can be.

      • createChart

        private static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createChart(org.jfree.data.category.CategoryDataset eventsDataset,
                                                      org.jfree.data.category.CategoryDataset recordersDataset,
                                                      org.jfree.data.category.CategoryDataset samplesDataset)
        This method creates the JFreeChart based on all of the incoming data sets.
        Parameters:
        eventsDataset - This is the data set corresponding to the events bar chart graph.
        recordersDataset - This is the data set corresponding to the recorders line graph.
        samplesDataset - This is the data set corresponding to the samples line graph.
        Returns:
        This returns a JFreeChart with all 3 of the graphs described.
